title: Just Like in the Movies
description: Ava Jones has settled for a life that she’s not sure she wants anymore, but won’t admit it. Her best friend, Erica Davidson talks her into taking a break on the Isle of Wight. Her days on the island are spent thinking things through, and arguing with Morgan whom she hates on principal.Is it so wrong for her to want a life that follows the script of a honest to God romance film?
author: M.B. Feeney
